text: Zhizn' blizhayshaya podobna vode, kotoruyu My nizveli s neba: smeshalis' s neyu rasteniya zemli, kotorymi pitayutsya lyudi i zhivotnyye, a kogda zemlya priobrela svoy blesk i razukrasilas' i dumali obitateli yeye, chto oni vlastvuyut nad ney, prishlo k ney Nashe poveleniye noch'yu ili dnem, i My sdelali yeye pozhatoy, kak budto by i ne byla ona bogatoy vchera. Tak raspredelyayem My znameniya dlya lyudey, kotoryye razmyshlyayut
